description.value:
The Skills of a Scholar or Artisan to aid in research, provide knowledge, create some art piece, etc. Treat as individual possessing appropriate Lore or Trade skills. Availability may vary, Craftsmanship decides how skilled they are.

Effect: Scarce

Notes: -
